name: Pout Preserve Hydrating Peptide Lip Treatment
about: What it is: An advanced lip treatment with skin-supporting peptides and kokum butter that quickly, visibly plumps lips with hydration and smooths fine lines...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity..Shade Description:.Anine Bing Strawberry Sorbet Glimmer: Mauve pink tint with rose gold glimmer + freshly picked strawberry scentCitrus Sunshine Glimmer: Sheer tint with gold glimmer + fresh citrus scentLingonberry Jam Glimmer: Magenta tint with silver glimmer + sweet berry scentCreme Brulee Glimmer: Beige tint with rose gold glimmer + vanilla brown sugar scent..Highlighted Ingredients:- Lip-specific Peptides: Makes lips look more defined and fuller..- Kokum and Mango Seed Butter: Soothe, nourish, and condition lips..- Cloudberry Oil: Provides intense moisture and visibly softens lips...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: This lip treatment goes beyond hydration: It visibly counteracts volume loss and restores bounce with lip-specific peptides and nourishing butters and oils. The active formula is clinically tested to give you softer, bouncier, fuller-looking lips in just one week. Plus, youu2019ll love its naturally derived citrus scent and smooth texture...Clinical Results: In an 8-week clinical study on 39 people:.- 97% agree it enhances the look of lips.- 95% agree it rescues dry, flaky lips.- 90% agree it gives lips a healthy bounce....CLEAN at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing on effectiveness....This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner.
ingredients: -Lip-specific Peptides: Makes lips look more defined and fuller. .-Kokum and Mango Seed Butter: Soothe, nourish, and condition lips. .-Cloudberry Oil: Provides intense moisture and visibly softens lips...Polybutene,  Hydrogenated  Polydecene,  Bis-Diglyceryl  Polyacyladipate-2, Hydrogenated   Styrene/Isoprene   Copolymer,   Cera   Microcristallina/Microcrystalline Wax/Cire  Microcristalline,  Silica,  Rubus  Chamaemorus  Seed  Oil,  Garcinia  Indica  Seed Butter, Euterpe   Oleracea   Sterols,   Palmitoyl   Hexapeptide-12,   Palmitoyl   Tripeptide-1, Tocopheryl  Acetate,  Tocopherol,  Irvingia  Gabonensiskernel  Butter,  Citrus  Aurantium Dulcis  (Orange)  Peel  Oil,  Citrus  Aurantium  Dulcis  (Orange)  Peel  Wax,  Citrus  Aurantium Dulcis   (Orange)   Fruit   Extract,   Linoleic   Acid,   Linolenic   Acid,   Oleic   Acid,   Lactic   Acid, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cera Carnauba/Copernicia  Cerifera  (Carnauba)  Wax/Cire  De  Carnauba,  Hydrogenated  Coco-Glycerides,   Sorbitan   Isostearate,   Pentaerythrityl   Tetraisostearate,   Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl     Hydroxyhydrocinnamate,     Octyldodecanol,     Ethylhexyl     Palmitate, Dicalcium   Phosphate,   Tribehenin,   Propylene   Carbonate,   Stearalkonium   Hectorite, Parfum/Fragrance,  Citral,  Limonene,  Linalool,  Iron  Oxides  (Ci  77491,  Ci  77492),  Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891). .....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Swipe onto lips for an instant boost of hydration that lasts..-Glow tip: Use after lip color for added shine..-Precautions: For external use only. Use as directed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After terrible experiences with other lip products, I have been searching for something new and this one is perfect! I love the strawberry scent and tint but will definitely try the other shades! I have always struggled with chapped lips but havenu2019t since I started using this product. The formula is really thick and moisturizing so it doesnu2019t have to be applied often.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product overall. Love the hydration. The original citrus flavor is perfection. Had to leave a review for the Creme Bru00fblee though because I saw lots of people saying it smelled awful. I'm truly not that picky so I was like- surely it's fine. I liked the light nude color and was like honestly, how bad could the smell be? BAD. The complaints were 100% right. It's horrific. Like rotten popcorn that's been baking out in the sun or something. I can't wrap my mind around how anyone thinks this smells good and will honestly probably just throw it away.

reviews.review_title: The best lip treatment out there!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this lip treatment since it came out, so way before it went viral. I use it as an overnight lip treatment and also during the day. After my skin care, I add a drop or 2 of hyaluronic acid and add this on top and when I wake up in the morning, my lips feel plump and hydrated and still have a good amount of product left on my lips (and Iu2019m a wild sleeper). This leads me to say one tube will last soo long since itu2019s so long wearing.  I will say I definitely like this better than the Laneige lip sleeping mask. Itu2019s a thicker consistency, but not sticky. Buy it, you WILL NOT regret it. Iu2019m definitely buying in more colours once my current tube is empty. Xx

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have large lips and Iu2019m really always searching for lip balms that stay on for long enough and hydrate. This is one of the best I've come across. Have tried in the citrus shade too but I wanted to make sure this shade got a good review because itu2019s lovely, neutral but classy. The scent is sweet but not sickly. Writing after almost a year of use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smoothe, moisturizing, softening,  And the scent is heavenly. I canu2019t get enough of this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been obsessed! I donu2019t need to apply it as often as other products and it leaves my lips super hydrated!

reviews.review_text: There is nothing special about this lip balm at all. First of all, I hate the scent itu2019s like an orange push pop smell that I donu2019t like. I really didnu2019t see much of a difference with hydration or moisture on the lips. I have tons of lip balms and lip glosses and this one unfortunately goes to the bottom of the drawer for me. unfortunateunfortunately is going to the bottom of

reviews.review_text: I use this literally everyday! Itu2019s on the thicker side but i love using it in the morning and at night! I have this one and the pink one!

reviews.review_text: Received a used one in dirty packaging ! Returned it, never got to try

reviews.review_text: I recently tried this cause I saw the hype of this product on tiktok and heard lots of good things! Ive been using my OG laneige lip sleeping mask plus the lipbalm version for years now but honestly, im starting to love this one more. I find it more hydrating & not as sticky as my laneige. I love the smell of the strawberry sorbet too! If youre looking for a sign to buy this product, this is the sign! Go get this one girlfriend ud83dudc8c. I only took 1 star off cause my product wasnu2019t filled all the way.

reviews.review_text: I loveeee the pigment and how moisturizing this is. Even when itu2019s not on anymore my lips feel fuller and softer! The formula is thick so I donu2019t use a lot at once, which tbh I like because itu2019ll last longer. I reach for this more than any of my other lippies.

Iu2019m going to order all the other flavors now.

reviews.review_text: Itu2019s really just okay. I really wanted to return it but wanted to give it more time. Iu2019ve had it over a month. Iu2019ve had better lip balms. Save your money. I was expecting way more. I never do reviews either.

reviews.review_text: My daughter told me how great this was so i decided to grab one on my most recent trip to Sephora. I tried it when i got home and was immediately sorry I didnu2019t buy two.  One to leave beside my bed and one for my purse.

reviews.review_text: The product is OK - provides a light tint to the lips, but Topicalu2019s  is better, it just lack of shade range.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have Cocoa Creme and it provides light pigmentation and a nice gloss. I prefer this to a lip gloss since it is not over the top drippy glossy. The scent is mild and is moisturizing.   I prefer it to several other brands because it is easy to dispense just the right amount.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've recently been loving the Rhode Peptide Lip Treatment, but that doesn't have 'glimmer' options like Ole does. I picked this up in best-selling 'Strawberry Sorbet' glimmer, plus the regular version in this flavor. Turns out the regular was more my thing: non-sticky, hydrating and I can definitely see a bit more volume after a week of using this. I'm not too big on the scent nor the flavor of this balm, but the color works really well for me. I'd say a step up from Laneige, though not quite as hydrating as Rhode's. It is thick, but surprisingly non-sticky. I have seen some reviews floating about which mention it being sticky, but that hasn't been the case for me. It's possible they may have been using a different flavor to mine. Would repurchase.   ~ My Top 5 Beauty must-have list ~  1. Hair Loss Treatment: u2018Divine Herbalu2019 - Hair Oil  2. Shampoo: 'Sephora Collection' - Deep Cleaning Shampoo 3. Face Mask: u2018Peter Thomas Rothu2019 u2013 Pumpkin Enzyme Mask  4. Pigmentation + Anti-Aging Serum: u2018Divine Herbalu2019 - Facial Treatment Serum 5. Face Scrub: u2018Sisley' - Botanical Gentle Buffing Cream

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect consistency, tint, and applicator! Makes my lips feel comfortable in this frigid, dry Midwest winter.

reviews.review_title: expensive for it to have a few issues, but not bad
reviews.review_text: Sadly lost this in school. Note that the smell is strong and very accurate to it's designated scent, which i love but for some it could be too much. It's also quite sticky but not in a super bad way, though it does slightly dry out your lips. Pretty expensive but if your up for it, i wouldn't restrain.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So hydrating and not sticky. My favourite among all the lip treatments.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love this product. It's a thick consistency. Lasts a long time. Kinda gives the lips a plump look

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! Not sticky at all which is great! I tried another expensive lip peptide brand that starts with an R and this one is definitely a lot better. Will be purchasing this product again and in different shades as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute favorite shimmery lip balm! It adds the perfect amount of subtle tint, shine and deep hydration to the lips! You also cannot feel any grittiness from the shimmer. It feels just as smooth as the non-shimmery lip balm. So nice for every day or even a night time look paired with a lip liner!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After trying Summer Friday, these OleHenrikson are WAY better! Super hydrating and thick formula that melts into lips and keeps them coated. Hard to explain but Summer Friday lip balm kind of just sits on top of the lips. I feel like OH truly helps lips and SF leaves me needing more. So impressed that I immediately returned all the SF ones I bought so I could purchase all the OH ones instead. I love the Original Citrus (non glimmer) for everyday and care at night. I also love the limited edition collaboration I Heart Me (Strawberry Sorbet Glimmer) and its beautiful pink/bronze shade - naturally enhancing for a touch of color. I also love the Lingonberry Jam Glimmer for another colored one - its purple/berry shade is beautifully enhancing and bright/pretty. Other ones I tried at the store but didn't buy -- personally, the Strawberry Sorbet (non glimmer) is an artificial Strawberry fragrance but the shade of pink is gorgeous. The Creme Brulee (non glimmer) smelled sickly sweet, but again the brown nude is beautiful. Hard to get over the scent so likely won't buy these ones. Overall - sooo happy w the formula bc I am super sensitive and get allergic reactions to most lip products and balms.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the smell and the shade so so pretty. Itu2019s also very hydrating

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted this to be more pigmented like the pictures nit it just is not. It tastes amazing but that's not what my intent was. I went back to the summer friday's cherry lip balm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This balm smells incredible and feels hydrating without any heaviness.  I grabbed the lingonberry glimmer shade and I'm in love! I will probably grab a backup soon since this shade is currently LE.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Super over priced for what it is. I got two of them. They are very sticky. This one had a terrible fragrance I couldnu2019t stand. Iu2019m not even sensitive to smells. I had to wipe it off immediately. I will be returning it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this lip treatment. I wear it during my makeup prep AND as a glossy look . It leaves my lips chapped-free. It has saved me thru the dry weather.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am one of those people who has a lip balm everywhere. The car, my purse, my desk drawer, night stand, etc. I have also tried every ended . I ended up with Summer Fridays. It is good but the OleHenricksen lip balm is the best. I put it on at 6:30am and drink a cup of coffee and it is still on as if I reapplied it. I LOVE this lip balm. It is definitely my new favorite!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The Ligonberry Jam Glimmer is BY FAR the best shade they have come out with and I hope they keep it in the lineup! Absolutely gorgeous and feels so good on the lips.

reviews.review_title: It doesnu2019t just sit on the lips, it gets absorbed
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Like many people I have tried MANY lip balms over the years. Whenever I go to the store I tend to pick up a new one. I knew nothing of the hype when I bought this and after I had tried it-only my sister had recommended this to me. I was out and about with my sister and told her I forgot my lip balm and my lips were so dry. She let me try hers, and I thought it was really good. My first impression was: itu2019s thick, will probably sit on the lips and not actually hydrate into the deeper layers of the lips, and my lips will probably just get dry again at some point during the day.  My lips did not get dry. Instead, it moisturized my lips so much that the dead skin on them just kinda sloughed off. Iu2019ve only had a few lip balms in my life do that. This one was different-the thick formula allowed it to stay. Yes it does settle on the lips long after you put it on, but some of it does get absorbed. Because of this, it doesnu2019t feel like itu2019s just sitting there and masking the dead skin if that makes sense.   Itu2019s not sticky. I know some people claim it is, but to to me it does not qualify as a sticky lip balms. Itu2019s more like when you put a hand cream on and touch your palms together just after applying. Itu2019s the touch of moisturized skin, not tackiness. Iu2019ve had sticky lip balms and this is NOT the definition of it.   My lips have changed after using this. Theyu2019re less dry, they stay moisturized longer throughout the day. It has good staying power without having to constantly reapply. For once, they feel truly moisturized from within. Iu2019ve had two other lip balms do this, but one was too expensive, one sat on the lips and didnu2019t penetrate the skin, and (wait there was a third) another one didnu2019t taste good and would disappear after a few hours. This one is by far the best.  The cocoa one has a nice light cocoa scent and barely any taste. I just went back to buy the creme bru00fblee color. I will most likely get more. If youu2019re on the fence, just try it out.
Ju2019ai achete ce produit recemment la couleur faut penser u00e0 de la barbe u00e0 papa mauve il faut aimer cette teinte mais sinon cette texture est vraiment agreable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This shade is really pretty and the consistency is very thick and moisturizing. Can come off a bit sticky and the smell is okay.
Favorite lip balm, a real gem and it smells like fruit loops. Cute colorful packaging. Best texture and itu2019s glossy and makes my lips softer. A tiny bit sticky but it be like dat.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought both this product and Tula's rosy glow peptide lip treatment.  Overall, I prefer OleHenricksen's. Compared to Tula's, it's thicker and has more product in the tube.   I do like Tula's tint better, though. The strawberry sorbet tint is barely noticeable on me, and Tula's is a bit darker.  Both provide great hydrating effects, so I'm sold now on using peptide lip treatments, at least during the winter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is overhyped. Itu2019s a basic lip treatment. It feels nice on the lips but doesnu2019t last too long. I feel that the price is entirely unjustifiable. The scent is nothing special either. Feels nice on the lips, but i reach for my Tatcha kissu mask wayyy more. Skip this.

reviews.review_title: THIS IS A MUST BUY PRODUCT!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start off with, Iu2019ve lived with terrible dry and cracked lips. I will always bite the dead skin off in the big patches. Then I started caring and got this product. Legit in 3 DAYS, my dryness and patches of dead skin were gone and now my lips look healthy and plump! This is an absolute W product for anyone with cracking or dead skin patches on the lips!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! Bought strawberry sorbet and loved it so much I got the creme bru00fblee too. Great texture, feels so smooth and luxurious, and makes my lips so soft. Smells amazing too and cute tints

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: very hydrating. love the smell. long lasting . I purchased several more after this purchase

reviews.review_text: smells amazing, color is nice itu2019s sheer but still visible. The formula is very thick and hydrating. i would definitely recommend .

reviews.review_text: Not a big fan. Is a very think formula and smells great. However it is not hydrating imo. Just feels like a thick lip gloss. Decided to return.

reviews.review_text: Very hydrating and long lasting and love love the color. I line first with a natural liner and then add this on top and itu2019s the perfect elevated natural lip for everyday. Will never go back to laneige

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m picky with my lip treatments. I use them morning, throughout the day, and at night. This product is not sticky, but super hydrating. My husband has even made the comment how soft my lips feel. Since purchasing my first one, Iu2019ve now gone back and purchased all the glimmers!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is the perfect lip gloss if you have dry and cracked lips like me! the color and shine are beautiful in natural light, and i didnu2019t need to reapply until 3 hours after i first applied! the thick consistency honestly reminds me of carmez in a way that isnu2019t stixky, but rather, hydrating and soothing to my lips, especially in these cooler seasons!! when this goes back in atock PLS BUY!!

Super thick and creamy without being too sticky. Instantly hydrates my super dry lips! Creme Brulee smelled a little bit like plastic (?) when I first started using it, but now I'm used to the smell and loooove it! Tint is not noticeable on my fair skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been a great winter purchase for dry/chapped/sensitive lips. Itu2019s thick but not sticky. Simple shade that is flattering. Iu2019m someone who uses aquaphor for chap stick and this has a great addition for helping my lips stay healthy. additions

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I can't stand the overly sweet and fruity taste, but this balm is very moisturizing and stays on a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the BEST lip product at sephora it makes my lips so smooth and soft and i notice that theyu2019re more full and juicy now that iu2019ve been using it!!! if ur thinking about buying it DO IT!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best hydrating lip gloss on the market. It doesnu2019t get enough hype. Itu2019s truly the perfect viscosity and pigment. It stays on and hydrates as you wear it. Donu2019t sleep on this product. Itu2019s a must buy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got a full size in the Sephora Advent Calendar, and oh my it works wonders. I live way up north and get really bloody chapped lips in the winter but since using this, my lips are smooth and crack free.u2728

reviews.review_title: Like it but donu2019t love it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was really hoping this would be an amazing product but itu2019s just okay. Itu2019s more like a slightly tinted gloss and less of a u201ctreatment.u201d It looks nice on and smells/tastes good but I havenu2019t noticed any benefits

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The formula is really thick and nice on the lips but the scent and taste is really unexpected. I donu2019t know if this is just a problem with mine but it tastes like tap water and smells like it too. Has a good color on the lips and the color is very buildable!
